# Software development coordination

This repo should be used for coordinating all the software development activities by the ForeSITE group. Here is an example of another project (open) where I coordinated/organized open-source dev practices: https://github.com/USCbiostats/software-dev. We can use lots of it here.

# Existing software packages

```{r}
#| label: existing_software
#| echo: false
library(readxl)
library(data.table)

existing_software <- read_excel(
    path = "data/box/ForeSITE_Tools surveyV2_ Tool D&I only.xlsx",
    skip = 2
    ) |> as.data.table()

cnames <- c(
    Tool = "Tool Name",
    Description = "Brief Description",
    Languages = "Languages",
    Repo = "GitHub Repo (new or old if existing one)"
)

existing_software <- subset(existing_software, select=cnames)

setnames(existing_software, cnames, names(cnames))

existing_software[, Repo := fifelse(
    grepl("github", Repo, ignore.case = TRUE),
    sprintf("[(GitHub)](%s)", Repo),
    ""
)]

dat <- existing_software[, .(
    Tool = sprintf("%s (%s)", Tool, Languages),
    Description = sprintf(
        "%s<br>%s",
        Description,
        Repo
    )
)]

# Adding a number
dat[, N := 1:.N]
dat <- dat[, c("N", "Tool", "Description")]

knitr::kable(dat)
```
